graphql.query:
query {
  User (id: "u1"){
      id
      email
      name
      slug
      avatar
      coverImg
      role
      locationName
      about
      createdAt
      updatedAt
      disabled
      allowEmbedIframes
      deleted
      termsAndConditionsAgreedAt
  }
}

response.name: user (ID!)
